name: Sweet Home On The Hill
description:
As the mysterious 'Dee', hired to catalog art pieces in a strange manor, you will explore rooms filled with monsters, puzzles and traps. Use your tools and telekinetic powers to stay alive, but if you fail, don't worry, you have a deal...

This is the first chapter of a first person exploration RPG inspired by the NES game "Sweet Home", among other things. Making it took me about 120 hours and I think I've explored a few cool ideas in there without being able to attain the level of polish and satisfaction with the core gameplay mechanics that I would've required to keep on pushing to make it a full game. 

You can use WASD to move or the arrows, or even the mouse! Left clicking will move you forward, right clicking will move you backwards and you can use the wheel to turn left or right!
